button.class: btn btn-sm btn-primary pull-right ml8 o_clipboard_button

div.button: Copy the full error to clipboard
div.p: Please use the copy button to report the error to your support service.

t.t-if: item.create_uid and item.write_uid and item.create_uid[0] != item.write_uid[0]

div.p: Try to add some records, or make sure that there is at least one measure and no active filter in the search bar.

t.div: Select a model to add a filter.

div.t: Match records with the following rule:

button.class: btn btn-xs btn-primary fa fa-plus o_domain_leaf_value_add_tag_button

li.t-attf-class: o_field_selector_item #{relationToFollow and 'o_field_selector_next_page' or 'o_field_selector_select_button'}#{line_index == 0 and ' active' or ''}

button.class: btn btn-sm btn-default fa fa-trash-o o_clear_file_button

t.t-esc: filter.attrs.string or filter.attrs.help or filter.attrs.name or 'Î©'

div.p: This wizard will export all data that matches the current search criteria to a CSV file. You can export all data or only the fields that can be reimported after modification.

div.h4: Save fields list Fields to export

p.strong: Please pay attention that all records matching your search filter will be exported. Not only the selected ids.
Please note that only the selected ids will be exported.
